hero.main-paragraph: The first step to joining Balakun is to sign up, become a verified students and then create your profile. Once you have created your profile you will be able to connect with a fluent English speaking mentor, join group lessons and speaking clubs and start working on your English skills.
hero.description-mentor: Create a profile on Balakun to showcase your language learning goals and interests.
hero.description-student: Browse through a list of native English speaking volunteers and connect with them.
